events.name: QuoteGenerated
events.description: Captures the moment a quote is successfully created for a customer.

events.name: QuoteApproved
events.description: Indicates that a quote has been reviewed and accepted by the customer or internal team.

events.name: QuoteExpired
events.description: Tracks when a quote is no longer valid after a specific time period.

events.name: QuoteRevised
events.description: Denotes that an existing quote has been modified before approval.

commands.name: GenerateQuote
commands.description: Captures the moment a quote is successfully created for a customer.

commands.name: ApproveQuote
commands.description: Indicates that a quote has been reviewed and accepted by the customer or internal team.

commands.name: ExpireQuote
commands.description: Tracks when a quote is no longer valid after a specific time period.

commands.name: ReviseQuote
commands.description: Denotes that an existing quote has been modified before approval.

integrationPoints.name: PricingService
integrationPoints.description: Integrates with an external pricing service to fetch real-time product prices.

integrationPoints.name: CustomerRelationshipManagement
integrationPoints.description: Integrates with CRM systems to update customer information related to quotes.

integrationPoints.name: InventoryManagement
integrationPoints.description: Coordinates with inventory system to check product availability for quoted items.
